I've tried crawling this seed with both H1.14.x and H3, with our 
standard default configuration, and in both cases:

(1) both the page, and the 'index.html.gz' version are served as 
'text/html' desite the extension
(2) the various per-letter links and individual listing example links 
are found and crawled

So, it must be some other change you've made in your configuration, or 
some other way the server is treating your crawler differently, that's 
preventing the links from being found.

What version are you using, and what other configuration changes have 
you made?

What appears in your crawl.log for the URIs...

http://www.xing.com/de/directories/people/
 > http://www.xing.com/de/directories/people/index.html.gz

???

- Gordon @ IA


Christian Hip wrote:
> 
> 
> I am trying to fetch pages from xing:
> 
> http://www.xing.com/de/directories/people/
> # Heritrix added seed redirect from http://www.xing.com/de/directories/people/.
> http://www.xing.com/de/directories/people/index.html.gz
> 
> Heritrix add the redirect page /the gzip version of the seed-url) 
> automatically to the seeds. But it seems that the HTMLExtractor don't 
> work for pages that are gzip. Therefore heritrix is not able to follow 
> the links. Is there a way to follow the links with heritrix?
> 
> Thanks for answers,
>  Christian
> 
> 
> 
>
